column1: Little Goat Diner////As a lot of the previous reviews stated
column3: OVERLY salted and just overall not as good as I expected given my experience at chef Izard's other restaurants. Not to mention
column4: you ARE paying West Loop prices which also didn't help stomach the salty food. The pork belly fries were salty
column5: lacked more pork belly and really not good. The one star on the menu I did get to try was the roasted cauliflower. The sauce
column6: roasting and crunchiness reminded me of a sweet and sour chicken or sorts.
